channel.title: [delta] ::setlevel

item.title: [delta] ::setlevel
item.dc:creator: @ServerPKisfun ServerPKisfun
item.description:
@ServerPKisfun wrote:

okay so my code works fine but i dont want it to work if they have items or in pvp.
heres code.

if (command.startsWith("setlevel")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int skillID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int level = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); playerXP[skillID] = getXPForLevel(level); playerLevel[skillID] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[skillID]); refreshSkills(); sM("Set level to " + level + "."); } else { sM("Invalid format, use as - ::setlevel SKILLID LEVEL"); } }

Read full topic
